_source.short_desc: Enables drivers and dispatchers to leverage push-to-talk technology to communicate instantly and efficiently.
_source.long_desc: Improve the efficiency of your operation by enabling drivers to instantly communicate with the first available dispatcher. Dispatchers automatically share the call load as driver requests enter a queue. Drivers only speak to dispatchers, who reply back to each driver individually.
_source.pricing_details: Pricing is available on a monthly subscription of $8 per user per month, and an annual subscription of $81.6 per user per month.
_source.target_audience: Zello is a push-to-talk app that connects frontline workers, teams, and communities through the power of live, human voice. Zello works in a variety of industries enabling efficient PTT communication.

related_products.short_desc: Dispatch, Tracking & Navigation, Documentation, Integrations, Facility Insights, Fleet View, Document Management & more.
related_products.features: Receive real-time dispatch updates & deploy navigation within the app. Get proof of delivery and instantly validate work with document uploading. Connect apps like McLeod, TMW, Prophesy, & more to optimize operations. Make more informed load decisions with better insight into facility dwell times. Eliminating guesswork by seeing all your drivers, vehicles, and assets in one platform. View and download receipts, forms, and photos submitted from the app.

related_products.short_desc: Verizon Connect's fleet management software for small to medium-sized businesses with fleet sizes of 5 or more vehicles.
related_products.features: Verizon Connect provides business customers with the insights and intelligence needed to optimize their operations and drive growth. Through a cloud-based, end-to-end solution, Verizon Connect accurately measures a user's fleet's performance, uncovers hidden costs and opportunities for improved efficiency, while empowering them to better manage service with real-time alerts and reports.

related_products.short_desc:
Routing chaos finally solved! Extremely easy-to-use, Route4Me plans routes for your business.

Call Today & Get Started
+1-888-552-9045
related_products.features:
Routing chaos finally solved. Extremely easy-to-use, Route4Me automatically plans routes for your business and dispatches them to a mobile app with built-in navigation. 

Perfect for field service, field sales, field marketing, territory management, and every business requiring last-mile optimization.

Route4Me provides the world's most used route sequencing and optimization software for small businesses and enterprises to over 35,000 customers.

Call Today & Get Started
+1-888-552-9045

related_products.short_desc: Powered by Truckstop.com, the most-used, affordable, user-friendly trucking or freight broker software for small to medium companies.
related_products.features: Powered by Truckstop.com, ITS Dispatch is the number one trucking business solution in North America. With over 50,000 satisfied users, ITS is the most affordable, easy-to-use web-based trucking & freight broker software for small to medium sized companies. You'll get the crucial tools needed to organize and grow your business, including IFTA processing, one-click invoicing, complete load management & Quickbooks integration with unlimited users & free expert support. Request a FREE DEMO today!

related_products.short_desc: Streamline your fleet operations and reduce costs with Samsaras all-in-one platform for GPS tracking, safety, ELD compliance and more.
related_products.features: Streamline your operations and reduce costs with Samsaras all-in-one platform for fleet management. Live-to-the-second GPS tracking shows your vehicles in real time and pairs with rich reports so you can plan better routes, dispatch drivers at the last minute, and share accurate ETAs with customers. With integrated dash cams, driver safety scores, and automatic alerts for speeding, idling, and geofences, Samsara helps you protect your business and assets. Samsara is an FMCSA-approved ELD.

related_products.short_desc: No set-up fees. No contracts. Manage operations, dispatch, equipment, accounting & admin. Free driver phone app. From $99 to $239/mo
related_products.features: Award winning web-based transportation management software. No set-up fees. No contracts. Free trial. Tailwind's all-in-one TMS improves cash-flow & profits for small to mid-sized trucking companies, freight brokerages, and those that do both. Compete with the big guys - starting at just $99/month. Tailwind helps manage operations, customers, dispatch, admin & accounting. It also includes the free 'POD Complete' trucking app (Android & iPhone) and syncs with QuickBooks Online.

related_products.short_desc: A full suite of paratransit, NEMT, and demand-response software.
related_products.features: TripMaster from CTS Software brings you all of the tools needed to run your transit operation. Our full suite of scheduling, billing, and reporting functions, along with advanced features like mapping, auto scheduling, an MDT interface, broker imports, and an online rider portal, saves you time and money. Matched with our unparalleled tech support, Trip Master helps you see what efficiency really is. Get a 90-day money back guarantee to see if TripMaster is right for your transit operation!

related_products.short_desc: Onfleet's software simplifies your local delivery operations from start to finish. Start your free trial today!
related_products.features: Onfleet's modern, Transportation Dispatch software makes it easy for couriers to manage and analyze their local deliveries. Onfleet includes intuitive smartphone apps for drivers, a real-time web dashboard for dispatchers, and automated SMS notifications and driver tracking for your customers. Our API allows for integration into online ordering and other systems. Our software has powered millions of deliveries for couriers in 60+ countries around the world. Start your free trial today!

related_products.short_desc: A Connected Fleet Cloud that operationalizes fleet and asset intelligence to increase safety, productivity and efficiency.
related_products.features:
IntelliShift is the ONLY fleet intelligence platform that enables businesses with fleets of vehicles and heavy equipment to EASILY access ALL fleet operations data from a single platform.

IntelliShift's solutions are designed to solve safety and operational challenges and can easily combine with the point solutions you use today to feed digestible views.

Leverage AI dashcams, telematics, inspections, maintenance, and compliance technology to drive better business outcomes.

related_products.short_desc: Our Robust SaaS product which helps you save more than 15% of logistics costs by optimizing your fleet, distribution routes & capacity.
related_products.features: LogiNext Mile is a state-of-the-art last mile distribution and route optimization software which enables you to save costs by optimizing your delivery routes, automating delivery resource allocation, and scheduling dispatch while dynamically tracking all on-ground movements. Rated globally as the best solution, LogiNext Mile offers the most comprehensive distribution logistics and delivery route optimization solution making your route planning and resource management flawless.

related_products.short_desc: Cut down on operating costs, reduce mileage, and improve customer service with Workwave's web-based route planning software.
related_products.features: Cut down on operating costs, reduce mileage, and improve customer service with Workwave's web-based route planning software. Identify the fastest, most efficient routes within minutes and take the headache out of planning & scheduling. Start optimizing today's routes or plan for the whole month. Demo Workwave Route Manager today and let us do the heavy lifting for you!

similar_products.short_desc: Salesforce Field Service, built on the world's #1 CRM, empowers teams to provide a connected experience. By connecting the back office
similar_products.features: Salesforce Field Service, built on the world's #1 CRM, empowers teams to provide a connected experience. Stay on top of your mobile workforce with real-time visibility into each employee's operations. Coordinate and optimize how your mobile resources and employees are utilized. Use List View to get details on individual appointments, and use Map View to see where your agents are and what they're working on.

similar_products.short_desc: Dispatch, Invoice, Prepare driver settlements, IFTA, Factoring schedules all in one click. Connect with drivers via ezLoads Driver App.
similar_products.features:
ezLoads is All-in-One software for trucking companies that allows to manage daily operations within one, integrated system. It's a web-based, intuitive, easy-to-use platform. Dispatch, Invoice, Organize loads, Prepare driver settlements, IFTA, Financial Reports, DOT compliance, Factoring integration, Fuel import, Dispatch board. 
ezLoads Driver App can be used as a PDF scanner or integrated with ezLoads TMS. Drivers can update load statuses and submit POD directly into the ezLoads TMS.

similar_products.short_desc: Dispatch and Accounting Software for your trucking company (LTL, FTL, Dumptruck, Oilfield) that is completely integrated in real-time.
similar_products.features: Axon Dispatch Software for Trucking Companies - Visit our site for over 80 reviews from actual users. Quickly access the status of orders, trucks, trailers and drivers. It's easy to see where your trucks are, driver are availability and if your loads are on schedule. Add the Axon Trucking Link App or Integration with Satellite tracking providers. Axon's dispatch is also designed to integrate seamlessly with our Accounting, Payroll & IFTA reporting functions.Get your FREE demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: EXTRA last mile cloud-based dispatching software manages and optimizes routes and orders for service and local delivery drivers.
similar_products.features: Last Mile/Local Delivery Management Software! Company Elite EXTRA has over two decades of innovation and experience to help power your last mile deliveries. EXTRA advanced dispatch management software includes: automated dispatching; integrating multiple delivery options; real-time tracking and ETAs; customer notification options, including a real-time tracking link with map; live mobile SDK with map; customer portal and ETA API; route optimization; and, central dispatch to pool fleets.

similar_products.short_desc: Over 40-years thousands of drayage and intermodal carriers have relied on Envase transportation dispatch software to streamline ops.
similar_products.features: Envase Technologies has provided mission-critical, Intermodal and Drayage-focused transportation dispatch software and mobile applications for over 40 years. The software merges order entry, dispatch, container tracking, electronic data interchange (EDI), API connectivity, document imaging, invoicing, settlements, and business intelligence, among other functions, into a single, streamlined system.

similar_products.short_desc: Focused on efficiency, cost savings, customer service & driver retention, Trimble's Carrier TMS is designed with your success in mind.
similar_products.features: Trimble TMS for carriers, Innovative, TL2000, TMW.Suite and TruckMate include critical operations functionality such as load planning, route optimization, dispatch, tracking, and driver and equipment management, administrative functions such as invoicing, payroll, settlements, document management and accounting, and critical integrations such as ELD, maintenance, EDI, fuel cards and visibility.

similar_products.short_desc: Fully integrated freight, fleet, accounting & compliance. Our all-in-one platform is built for shippers, carriers, and brokerages.
similar_products.features: Every day, trucking companies throughout the country manage their businesses with our powerful, integrated, online Transportation Management System, Express Online. Whether you run Truckload, LTL, Intermodal or Brokerage, Express Online gives you the power to control your dispatch, accounting and fleet management with one TMS system available anytime, anywhere in the cloud.

similar_products.short_desc: Map data + AI platform to solve dispatch challenges. Boost efficiency of scheduling, order batching, many-to-many scenarios, etc.
similar_products.features: NextBillion.ai is a leading spatial data + AI platform that helps enterprises build, scale, and manage their own mapping ecosystems to leverage location data and optimize on cost, scale, and UX. Our AI-powered unified platform helps organizations solve complex transportation dispatch challenges by processing both first-and third-party location data to enhance operational efficiency of scheduling, order batching, one-to-many and many-to-many scenarios, etc. Boost customer delight and improve ROI.

similar_products.short_desc: TripSpark NEMT offers scheduling, notifications, mobile apps and more to improve Non-Emergency Medical Transportation operations.
similar_products.features:
TripSpark NEMT offers:

- Scheduling - complete management of trips, vehicles and clients/members. Automated scheduling ensures faster and more reliable scheduling with digital data collection to share mission critical information quickly, facilitating reimbursements.

- Notifications - Automate inbound and outbound communication with clients and members. Reduces call center volume, while reducing no shows and wasted vehicle miles.

- Self-service Portal
- Mobile app for drivers

similar_products.features:

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Field Service Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Field Service Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Field Service Management software enables organizations to manage resources and communicate with field employees. Field Service Management systems enhance productivity by allowing constant contact between dispatch office and offsite personnel. They improve the customer experience by giving field personnel access to service histories, mapping services, scheduling tools and to the organization's knowledge base resources. Field Service Management software is related to Maintenance Management software and Service Dispatch software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Service Dispatch software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Service Dispatch tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Service Dispatch software assists with the scheduling and dispatching of field personnel. Service Dispatch applications enhance efficiency and productivity by allowing constant contact between dispatch office and offsite personnel. Service Dispatch solutions also provide field personnel with access to service histories, contracts, mapping services, job management and scheduling tools, expediting work orders and reducing downtime. Service Dispatch software is related to Field Service Management software and Maintenance Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Trucking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Trucking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Trucking software automates dispatch, fleet management, and maintenance for trucking companies. Trucking solutions can also be used for mapping routes and calculating industry standard ratings, practical miles, and fuel tax. These applications also often include driver log features, to regulate and record the number of hours operators spend on the road. Trucking software is related to Distribution software, Fleet Management software, Logistics software and Shipping software.
